name: Mexican Mole Sauce
author: ROSEP47
summary: This is a good version to make with ingredients you can keep on hand. Serve with a rotisserie chicken or your own cooked chicken to give it an entirely different flavor. Rice and/or tortillas plus salad greens, sliced avocado, and chopped tomatoes round out a simple but special meal.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can diced green chile peppers
directions: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat, and cook the onion until tender
Mix in cocoa powder, cumin, cilantro, and garlic
Stir in the tomato soup and green chile peppers
Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer 10 minutes
Transfer to a gravy boat or pour directly over food to serve
